definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: The wind comes in, carries a magnetic field, which wraps around the ionosphere of the planet.
sentences.chinese: 太陽風過來時攜帶的磁場把行星的電離層纏繞住。

sentences.english: Ionospheric delay is one of the largest error sources for single-frequency GPS navigation and Positioning applications.
sentences.chinese: 電離層延遲是單頻GPS導航定位的主要誤差源之一。

sentences.english: This mode is very sensitive to the ionospheric Doppler modulation.
sentences.chinese: 這種模式是非常敏感的電離層多普勒調製。

sentences.english: In this paper, ionospheric disturbances during geomagnetic storms at the Great Wall station in Antarctic are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了磁暴期間南極長城站的電離層擾動特性。

sentences.english: A theoretical model for the mid-latitude ionospheric E layer is established in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了一箇中緯電離層E層理論模式。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the background ionosphere model is very important factor in the filed of ionosphere reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 也表明了背景電離層模型在電離層重構中的重要作用。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the background ionosphere model is very important factor in the filed of ionosphere reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 也表明了背景電離層模型在電離層重構中的重要作用。

sentences.english: Like Earth, Jupiter has a magnetized ionosphere that rotates with the planet.
sentences.chinese: 木星和地球一樣擁有環繞行星的磁化電離層。

sentences.english: Rockets and artificial satellites can go far above the ionosphere.
sentences.chinese: 火箭和人造衛星能夠到達電離層以上極遠的地方。

sentences.english: Chapter 5 bring forward several improved methods which are used in correction techniques of ionospheric distortion.
sentences.chinese: 第五章提出了幾種改善的電離層污染的校正方法。

sentences.english: The propogation is badly today, so very strong noise on the band now.
sentences.chinese: 今天電離層情況不好，現在這個波段上有很強的噪音。

sentences.english: The ionosphere is basically dragged away.
The authors explain a double layers and plane valley electron density profile.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種雙層平谷電離層電子密度模式。
